numberValidator.message: The document root element must be a catalog, a provider or a course

furtherInformation.div:
The document root element must be a <catalog>, a <provider> or a <course> element within the http://xcri.org/profiles/1.2/catalog namespace.
XCRI Documents element within the XCRI-CAP 1.2 wiki specification
Ensure that the document root element is one of the expected XCRI-CAP 1.2 elements.

urlValidator.message: All url elements must contain valid URLs

furtherInformation.div:
All url elements are expected to contain valid URLs to indicate a place on the provider's website where further information can be obtained.
<url> element within the XCRI-CAP wiki specification
Ensure that the URL value is fully-qualified valid and publically accessible. Typically the URL should start with "http://".

manualValidator.message: The contributor element should not be used for general contact information and should only be used when other refinements (e.g. presenter or lecturer) are not available.

urlValidator.message: Producers should use URLs for identifiers

emptyElementValidator.message: If a provider uses a duration element, it cannot be empty.

regularExpressionValidator.message: Any explicit language set must be one of the 2-character ISO 639-1 character codes.

furtherInformation.div:
Any XML "language" attributes (xml:lang) must contain a valid language according to the 2-character ISO 639 codes.
A full list of the ISO 639-1 character codes, as documented by the American Library of Congress.
Ensure that the xml:lang tag contains a valid 2-character code.
